channel.title: 流水帳 on HzChris
channel.description: Recent content in 流水帳 on HzChris

item.title: Something About The 2018 Taiwan Election
item.description: It is the first time that the mayor election combined with referendum in 2018/11/24. Because there are many referndum issues, if voters hadn’t prepared enough before going to vote, they would have spent much time to realize the descriptions of the referendum issues. Before arriving the reception desk, I’d been lined up for 1 and half hours. I almost complete one third of the novel ‘Mist Born’ in my kobo ereader.
